name: SukhmaniSaheb-SikhPrayer
0:
”Alexa, open sukh money baani”
”Alexa, start sukh money baani”
”Alexa, play sukh money baani”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sukh money baani
des:
Sukhmani Sahib is a sikh religion Prayer for Peace and joy of the mind is a set of 192 padas (stanzas of 10 hymns) present in the holy Guru Granth Sahib, the main scripture and living Guru of Sikhism from Ang 262 to Ang 296 (about 35 count). This Gurbani text (writing of the Gurus) was written by the 5th Guru, Guru Arjan (1563–1606) at Amritsar in around 1602. If you want Sukhmani Sahib to automatically start playing at certain time, follow below steps.
DAILY PRAYER ROUTINE
To add this loud alarm to a daily timer, follow these steps:
1 - Open your Alexa App.
2 - Select Routines.
3 - Select Schedule, add a time (say 12 PM) - time when you would like Sukhmani sahib to start automatically.
4 - Choose Skills / Your Skills.
5 - Choose 'Sukhmani Saheb - Sikh Prayer' Done.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
